minecraft:written_book_content.author: The Universe
pages:
{"text":"§bThe player has accomplished many goals.

§bThey have reached many milestones.

§aAchieved their journey’s End.

§bBut the journey is not yet over. "}

{"text":"§bThey will go great distances.

§bDiscover new places.

§aLearn new things.

§bAnd they will be free.

§bThis is the End.

§aAnd a new beginning."}
